metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7885 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Artifex jbig2dec 0.13 has a heap-based buffer over-read leading to denial of service (application crash) or disclosure of sensitive information from process memory, because of an integer overflow in the jbig2_decode_symbol_dict function in jbig2_symbol_dict.c in libjbig2dec.a during operation on a crafted .jb2 file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jbig2dec - 0.11+20120125-1ubuntu1.1
libjbig2dec0 - 0.11+20120125-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jbig2dec package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.11+20120125-1ubuntu1.1').
